Weekly Digest. End of Jan update

Feb 2, 2016

End of Janâ€¦ I am being lazy this month. Not much I have done. I am struggling to come up with a clean project template and I am now stuck on typography.

I read Responsive Typography: The Basics

and learnt:

  • Serif typeface can be used for web if it is above 12px in size.
  • To hold a well-printed book at a comfortable reading distance while looking at your website to compare.

I read http://alistapart.com/article/more-meaningful-typography

  • And learnt that each project requires custom typography and there is no really a golden rule for all the projects.
  • This is something to keep in mind though http://www.modularscale.com/
  • Use the 1:1.618 golden section as a rule of thumb

I am beginning to understand what Gulp and Grunt are for. Will learn to use these tools soon.
